snippet: Campbell’s Chunky soup is bringing back its Mama’s Boy ad campaign, starting with commercials featuring the New York Giants’ Victor Cruz.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column notes that Campbell’s Chunky soup is bringing back its Mama’s Boy ad campaign, starting with commercials featuring the New York Giants receiver Victor Cruz.
lead_paragraph: Campbell’s Chunky soup is bringing back its Mama’s Boy ad campaign, starting with commercials featuring the New York Giants’ Victor Cruz.

headline.seo: Campbell Revives N.F.L. Mom Ad With Giants’ Victor Cruz
headline.main: With Sales Sagging, Campbell Hands Off to a Powerful Spokeswoman
headline.print_headline: With Sales Sagging, Campbell Hands Off to a Powerful Spokeswoman
